00035 # define H_WitreServer

00045 namespace TREX {
00046   namespace witre {
00047 
00048     class WitreApplication;
00049     class WitreReactor;
00050     class WitreGraph;
00051 
00052     class WitreServer :public TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor, public TREX::transaction::graph::timelines_listener {
00053     public:
00054 
00055       class Error :public TREX::utils::Exception {
00056             public:
00057                 Error(std::string const &what) throw()
00058                     :TREX::utils::Exception(what) {}
00059                 virtual ~Error() throw() {}
00060       };
00061 
00062       // WitreApplication const &app() const;
00063       // WitreApplication &app();
00064 
00065       typedef std::list< std::pair<double, goal_id> > timed_goal;
00066 
00067       Wt::WServer const &wt() const;
00068       Wt::WServer &wt();
00069 
00070       void connect(WitreApplication *client, const boost::function<void()>& function);
00071       void disconnect(WitreApplication *client);
00072 
00073       std::string extTimelinesName(int i) { return externalTimelines[i].str(); }
00074       int extTimelinesSize() { return externalTimelines.size(); };
00075       const std::queue<std::string> receiveObs() { return observations; };
00076       bool acceptsGoal(TREX::utils::Symbol const &name) { return find_external(name)->accept_goals(); }
00077       time_t getTime_t() { time_t now = std::floor(tickToTime(getCurrentTick())); return now; };
00078       std::string getDependencies(std::string name);
00079       const timed_goal& plan() { return planTokens; };
00080 
00081       TREX::transaction::goal_id clientGoalPost(TREX::transaction::Goal const &g);
00082       TREX::transaction::Goal getGoal(std::string obs, std::string prd);
00083 
00084       WitreServer(TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type arg);
00085       ~WitreServer();
00086 
00087       bool attached() const {
00088        return NULL!=m_entry;
00089       }
00090       WitreReactor &reactor() const {
00091        return *m_entry;
00092       }
00093     private:
00094       //Trex functions
00095       void handleInit();
00096       void handleTickStart() {};
00097       void notify(TREX::transaction::Observation const &obs);
00098       bool synchronize();
00099       void newPlanToken(goal_id const &t);
00100       void cancelledPlanToken(goal_id const &t);
00101       //End of Trex functions
00102 
00103       struct Connection {
00104         Connection(const std::string& id, WitreApplication *c, const boost::function<void()>& f)
00105           : sessionId(id), client(c), function(f)
00106         { }
00107 
00108         std::string sessionId;
00109         WitreApplication *client;
00110         boost::function<void()> function;
00111       };
00112 
00113       void declared(TREX::transaction::details::timeline const &timeline);
00114       void undeclared(TREX::transaction::details::timeline const &timeline);
00115 
00116       void searchGraph();
00117 
00118 
00119       mutable boost::mutex mutex_;
00120       boost::thread thread_;
00121       std::vector<Connection> connections;
00122       std::vector<utils::Symbol> externalTimelines;
00123       std::queue<std::string> observations;
00124       timed_goal pastTokens;
00125       timed_goal planTokens;
00126       WitrePaintSearch::GraphMap timelineGraph;
00127 
00128 
00129       bool attach(WitreReactor &r);
00130       void detach(WitreReactor &r);
